fullText: There are few things more pleasant on a steamy New York afternoon or evening than to sit down in a cool theater, turn off your brain, and laugh for two hours straight. The Cottage more than fits that bill.

keyPhrases.quote: There are few things more pleasant on a steamy New York afternoon or evening than to sit down in a cool theater, turn off your brain, and laugh for two hours straight
The Cottage more than fits that bill

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic explicitly recommends the show as a pleasant, entertaining experience that delivers consistent laughs and fulfills its entertainment purpose.
